meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is combed up and back from the forehead.
meanings.sent1: She styled her hair into a neat pompadour for the party.
meanings.sent2: His pompadour was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: The pompadour hairstyle made her look very elegant.
meanings.sent4: Her hair stood tall like a pompadour, defying gravity.
meanings.sent5: The pompadour added a touch of sophistication to her overall look.

meanings.definition: A fabric with a high piled texture.
meanings.sent1: The couch was covered in soft pompadour fabric.
meanings.sent2: She loved the feel of the pompadour against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The pompadour material was so fluffy, it felt like sitting on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The pompadour fabric resembled a field of soft, fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent5: The pompadour texture added a luxurious touch to the room.

meanings.definition: A breed of domestic pigeon with a large crest.
meanings.sent1: The pompadour pigeon strutted proudly in the yard.
meanings.sent2: The pompadour bird's crest was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The pompadour pigeon looked like it was wearing a fancy hat.
meanings.sent4: The pompadour pigeon's crest was like a crown on its head.
meanings.sent5: The pompadour pigeon's crest made it stand out among the other birds.
